Reviews.Content: stayed 4 nights booked minute ba impressed price holidays flights 4 star establishment hotel easy tegel airport txl bus goes straight alexanderplatz stop approx 30 mins cant miss hotel tallest city towers square underground outside hotel easily city easily plus sbahn overground train station 2 min walk hotel swimming pool hotel staff friendly spoke english desk standard twindouble breakfast breakfast expensive 18e loads little bars cafes square breakfast cheaper 17th floor half view hotel square ok bit building site below bathroom sort planned shower sink bedroom shower curtain pull round privacy tea coffee facilities reasonably priced mini bar beer iron ring oneand length mirror night ok morning whilst taking shower fancy modern rain shower noticed basin filling water draining boyfriend shouting flooded entire floor bedroom covered water gone bed door design shower terrible water spilled entire floor door sinkshower simply spread left floor including clothes magazines chargers phones etc soaked leave shower phoned explained happened send person spoke english rang downstairs sort soaked shampoo hair embarrasing apologise change upgrade corner bathtub avoid repeat bedroom fashion fixing hold shower head onto wall broken stay admitted poorly designed bathroom total sq footage double aspect window view berlin main city lovely stay park inn alexanderplatz 4 star charge 4 star prices food internet accommodations badly designed stayed 4 star hotels missing basics expect 4 star especially regard bedroom size facilities available
